entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to rain or snow overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
